rasbt/LLMs-from-scratch

Code and tutorials for building GPT-style language models from the ground up in PyTorch

View on index

Related repos

  • Code and tutorials for building large language models from scratch in PyTorch
  • minimal PyTorch code for training your own small language model from scratch
  • Step-by-step code for adding reasoning to a pre-trained LLM, with hands-on examples and explanations
  • End-to-end multimodal LLM for any-to-any I/O
  • large language model tutorials and training basics from scratch
  • Code for training and fine-tuning GPT language models
  • 3D visualizer for GPT-style language models
  • Open cookbook for building top-tier code LLMs with complete training data and reproducible pipeline
  • Python toolkit for building LLM and RAG apps with lots of small, specialized models
  • Guide to fine-tuning LLMs with PyTorch and Hugging Face
